title: "Infosys (INFY) Partners With Daimler to Aid Cloud Transition"
excerpt: "Infosys INFY recently inked a long-term partnership with Daimler AG to deliver hybrid cloud-based innovation & build a robust technology-driven IT Infrastructure transformation for the latter. Daimler will gain access to Infosys Cobalt and other leading cloud providers to enable multi-cloud transformation with a smart hybrid cloud solution."
